plot: While the United States and it's allies aim their riffles on Iraq, a Danish girl and her Iraque father travel into the heart of Iraq. They want to see their family for maybe the last time ...
title: Tilbage til Bagdad
plot_es: While the United States and it's allies aim their riffles on Iraq, a Danish girl and her Iraque father travel into the heart of Iraq. They want to see their family for maybe the last time ...
